name: European Committee of Associations of Manufacturers of Gears and Transmission Parts
goal:
EUROTRANS (sector committee) seeks to impart to Mechanical Power Transmission companies of the member associations a better knowledge of the development of their industry in the following areas:
- Global networking platform
- Fairs and promotion matters
- Technical and technological development
- Standardisation and harmonisation
- World-wide information with associations outside and inside Europe
- Support our industry in the international fight against product piracy

EUROTRANS supports the European Power Transmission industry and their associations to be today and in the future one of the most successful and innovative supplier industries in the world. We are the European information network for the Power Transmission Engineering Industry.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, External Relations, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Monitoring of the EU regulation and standardisation work and its impact for our branches / companies.
